Demiurge Resistance.name: Demiurge Resistance
Demiurge Resistance.flavor: Your connection to destiny allows you to shrug off the most potent effects imposed on you.
Demiurge Resistance.trigger: You are subjected to an effect that a save can end
Demiurge Resistance.effect: You make a saving throw against the effect.
Demiurge Resistance.special: If you roll a 15 or higher on the saving throw, you regain the use of this power.
